title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 602.2 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 602.2 - General provisions

State Regulations

As indicated by their wording, a number of regulations in
this Part prescribe the normal procedures and practices to be directed in good
faith by the service provider. However, the regulations in this Part are not
intended to govern the implementation of such procedures in individual
instances. The execution or non-execution of such procedures and practices in
individual instances is not the sole indicator of whether the service provider
has provided adequate service to a particular consumer or group of
consumers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
602.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
